title: Question 10
prompt:
Later in the play, one of the characters says: “Now, I ain’t gonna have no more disturbance around here, Herald Loomis. You start any more disturbance and you leavin’ here, Saturday or no Saturday.”
Which character most likely delivers this line?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
Seth is concerned about the behavior of the people in the boarding house, and he says, “Know these is respectable quarters. I don’t put up with no foolishness.” Seth is the most likely character to warn another person about making a disturbance in the boarding house. He is also one of the owners of the boarding house, so he has the right to tell one of the boarders to leave, as he warns Herald Loomis:


Now, I ain’t gonna have no more disturbance around here, Herald Loomis. You start any more disturbance and you leavin’ here, Saturday or no Saturday.
